sentences.sentence: Three tests, including open field test, spatial water maze and rotarod test were applied to evaluate ambulation and muscular coordination.
sentences.translation: 采用开阔地试验、空间水迷宫试验和旋转台试验三种方法对步行能力和肌肉协调性进行了评价。

sentences.sentence: For example the correspondence power supply equipments of the Chinese ambulation.
